main event: A civilian observer in Torrance, California reported seeing a strange object in the sky on March 17, 1956.
interesting points: The object was round when standing still, but had a 'fish-shaped' appearance when it turned, similar to how a street light looks from different angles.
The object was bright white in color with a violet-colored exhaust trail that was about 25 feet long.
The object made a 'hose' sound and hovered at an altitude of 210 degrees and 45 degrees elevation.
The observer initially thought the object was a meteorite, but then saw it hover and turn.
The observation lasted for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
sighted object: a round, white object with a violet exhaust
